VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Rebeccaview Dolphins?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Rebeccaview Dolphins is arc {Cherylberg Sharks}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc South Stars?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc South Stars is arc {Cherylberg Sharks}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {Rebeccaview Dolphins} has the largest output flow.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?
VPR.A: {South Stars} has the largest input flow.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Rebeccaview Dolphins and Cherylberg Sharks in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Rebeccaview Dolphins and Cherylberg Sharks is {297}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Rebeccaview Dolphins and South Stars in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from South Stars?
SC.A: The total flow output from South Stars is {1187}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Cherylberg Sharks?

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 442? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {602} from {South Stars} to {Rebeccaview Dolphins}, a flow of {708} from {Rebeccaview Dolphins} to {South Stars}, a flow of {585} from {South Stars} to {Cherylberg Sharks}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 298? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {95} from {Rebeccaview Dolphins} to {Cherylberg Sharks}, a flow of {297} from {Cherylberg Sharks} to {Rebeccaview Dolphins}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 298 and 442? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {299} from {Cherylberg Sharks} to {South Stars}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from South Stars to Cherylberg Sharks or from Cherylberg Sharks to South Stars?
NC.A: The flow from {South Stars} to {Cherylberg Sharks} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Rebeccaview Dolphins to Cherylberg Sharks, from South Stars to Cherylberg Sharks, or from South Stars to Rebeccaview Dolphins?
NC.A: The flow from {South Stars} to {Rebeccaview Dolphins} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {South Stars}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Rebeccaview Dolphins} and {South Stars}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Cherylberg Sharks, Arc South Stars, Arc Rebeccaview Dolphins}.
